item.title: FPT Will Have a Mirror for Arch Soon
item.description: I’ve switched to ArchLinux from Fedora a couple of months ago and I really miss the mirror of Fedora on FPT (my current ISP). A few days ago, I wrote an email to ask the FPT mirrors admin to add a mirror for ArchLinux to their mirror systems. Here is what I wrote (in Vietnamese): Gởi Admin mirror của FPT. Arch Linux là một distro khá phổ biến hiện nay, ArchLinux đang đứng trong top 20 distro phổ biến theo Distrowatch.
